text: haey chaur puok anak kom rieb apa pipea cheamuoy puok sdrei mou sh ri ki n aoy saoh louhtrate puok neang mean chomnue . haey pitabrakd nasa teasei del mean chomnue noh brasaer cheang sdrei mou sh ri ki n towtiet tohbeicha neang thveu aoy puok anak chabarommo yeangnakadaoy . haey chaur puok anak kom rieb apa pipea( sdrei del mean chomnue) aoy tow borsa mou sh ri ki n aoy saoh . haey pitabrakd nasa tea sa del chea anakmean chomnue noh brasaer cheang borsa mou sh ri ki n towtiet tohbeicha borsa noh thveu aoy puok anak chabarommo yeangnakadaoy . puokke teangnoh nung ausateanh( puok anak) tow rk thanonork . chamnek a l laoh vinh ku ampeavneav( puok anak) tow rk thansuokr ning kar aphytosa tam kar anounhnhat robsa trong . haey a l laoh banhcheak yeang chbasa pi chbab teanglay robsa trong dl mnoussa lok daembi aoy puokke changcham
